# Nama Workflow
name: Deploy React (Vite) ke GitHub Pages

on:
 # Akan berjalan saat ada push ke branch 'main'
 push:
   branches: ["main"]

 # Memungkinkan deploy manual dari tab Actions
 workflow_dispatch:

# Mengizinkan GitHub Actions menulis ke Pages dan membaca konten
permissions:
 contents: read
 pages: write
 id-token: write

# Pastikan hanya satu deployment berjalan pada satu waktu
concurrency:
 group: "pages"
 cancel-in-progress: false

jobs:
 build:
   runs-on: ubuntu-latest
   steps:
     - name: Checkout kode
       uses: actions/checkout@v4
       
     # --- SETUP NODE.JS ---
     - name: Setup Node.js 20
       uses: actions/setup-node@v4
       with:
         node-version: 20
         cache: 'npm' # Menggunakan cache untuk mempercepat instalasi dependensi
     
     # --- INSTALL DAN BUILD ---
     - name: Install dependencies
       run: npm install
       
     - name: Build Aplikasi Vite
       # Perintah ini akan membuat folder 'dist'
       run: npm run build
       
     # --- DEPLOY KE PAGES ---
     - name: Setup Pages
       uses: actions/configure-pages@v5
       
     - name: Upload artifact (isi folder dist)
       uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
       with:
         # Vite secara default menghasilkan output ke folder 'dist'
         path: './dist'

 deploy:
   environment:
     name: github-pages
     url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}
   runs-on: ubuntu-latest
   needs: build
   steps:
     - name: Deploy ke GitHub Pages
       id: deployment
       uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
